conbody.p: This subpart provides optional procedures for (a)streamlined evaluation of offers for commercial items; and (b)streamlined solicitation of offers for commercial items for use where appropriate. These procedures are intended to simplify the process of preparing and issuing solicitations, and evaluating offers for commercial items consistent with customary commercial practices.
